title: Optimizing Lead-Free Cs2AgBiBr6 Double Perovskite Solar Cells: A Comprehensive Study Using Realistic Simulation Approach
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00958D, Paper
A S M Mosabbir, M. S. Sadek, Minhaz Mahmood, M. Mofazzal Hosain, Suhaila Sepeai, Puvaneswaran Chelvanathan, Sakhr M. Sultan, Kamaruzzaman Sopian, Mohd Adib Ibrahim, Md Khan Sobayel Bin Rafiq
This research adopts a novel blended simulation approach (By SCAPS and FDTD) to design and modelling of Cs2AgBiBr6 perovskite solar cell and comprehensively investigates its photovoltaic parameters by incorporating NiO...
